listings.title: 214 Lafayette Street
listings.description_excerpt: NY’S MOST INCREDIBLE, UNIQUE RENTAL PROPERTY!! this 5 Story Sun drenched Loft Townhouse is an architectural masterpiece, complete with an Indoor Pool, 3 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, 925 Square foot Terrace, and full basement. Designed to maintain yet modernize all the house’s original details. This Legal Live/Work House has a Grand office space/library with conference table, 19 foot ceilings overlooking Soho on one side and your very own private indoor POOL on the other. Above the office is a unique three-floor residential apartment. The main room has an open industrial Chefs Kitchen and a massive Cinematic living/dining area with exposed brick, 20 foot ceilings, wood burning fireplace, and motorized movie screen. Take 1 flight up to the Master Suite with its own sitting room, sun filled master bedroom, and gorgeous bathroom with steam shower and spa tub. Up one flight to an amazing Living Room with a full wall of windows leading to you own private Zen terrace, a laundry room and 2 full Bedrooms, with barrel vaulted ceilings. Additionally there is a full guest bedroom with full Bathroom, and a complete basement. This Space is also available Daily, weekly, monthly and for events

listings.title: 48 Mercer Street
listings.description_excerpt: SOHO WHITE LOFT. Acclaimed designer's spectacular FURNISHED Duplex Penthouse Residence in Historic landmark building. Published in Architectural Digest, this remarkable aerie has luxurious custom finishes and exquisite detail. Approx. 2,800 sq. ft. 4 bed/ 3 bath duplex floor-through with over 700 sq ft of private outdoor space. Wonderful light, unobstructed views and perfect entertaining flow. Direct keyed-elevator access opens to enormous great room with bleached oak floors, Venetian plastered walls,  sculptural ebony monolith fireplace. Soaring 15 foot ceilings, walls of glass and separate lounge and dining areas. Dramatic lacquer and stainless kitchen pavilion with Sub-Zero and Viking appliances. Fabulous silk upholstered library,yoga room and 3 family bedrooms, one with separate private terrace complete the main level. Stunning master suite encompasses the entire 2nd level with its glass solarium with wood-burning fireplace and private planted set-back terrace with sweeping downtown views. After a long day, retreat to your spa-bath with radiant heated floors, deep soaking Jacuzzi tub and separate steam shower!! Additionally, there is a wall of concealed storage and 2 cavernous walk-in dressing rooms designed to house the most extensive wardrobe collections. Washer/dryer, state-of-the-art LED color lighting system with 10 ambient mood settings, audio visual, intercom, multi-zone climate control and security systems are included in this exceptional space. Flexible terms. Please email in advance for private viewing.

listings.title: 30 Crosby Street
listings.description_excerpt: Sprawling pre-war condo loft; this rustic and chic Soho home offers more than 4,100 square feet of architecturally-handsome space. Accessed directly via private elevator, enter through an intimate foyer into an expansive living room, beautifully illuminated from the east by a shimmering wall of industrial-style, over-sized windows. Outfitted with exposed brick walls, original wooden columns, and a gas fireplace, the loft features high ceilings, hardwood floors, and authentic structural details. The open chef’s kitchen, overlooking the living and dining areas, is outfitted with top of line stainless steel appliances, including dual Sub-Zero refrigerators, separate wine cooler, double ovens and a vented cooktop. The baths are newly renovated and spacious. The master is a retreat unto itself with an enormous dressing room and spa-like bathroom, complete with double sinks, separate shower, soaking tub, and water closet. A separate laundry room and abundant storage space complete the package. 30 Crosby is a 7 story 13 unit Condo built in 1890. The building features a 24-hour doorman, elevator, and an exquisite wine-room on the lower level. Impressive yet cozy, and irresistibly charming, 4A at 30 Crosby offers luxury loft living at its finest, all on one of Soho’s most enchanting and conveniently located streets.

listings.title: 158 Mercer Street
listings.description_excerpt: Located in the coveted New Museum Building - Soho's premier, landmarked, full service pre-war condominium- this 4,200 SF corner loft, designed by Deborah Berke, is perfect for entertaining. The 60' living area includes an open kitchen with top of the line appliances, high ceilings, and wide plank oak floors. There is a separate library with built in walnut shelves and desk. The 450 SF master bedroom features beautiful floor to ceiling custom closets, and a luxurious bathroom. Abundant light fills the rooms through 16 oversized windows with North, South, and West exposures.

listings.title: 40 Mercer Street
listings.description_excerpt: Visionary architect Jean Nouvel's modern masterpiece melds exquisitely with the patina of SoHo's storied past, adding all the more allure to the neighborhood's present-day cachet. Clad in Nouvel's signature glass and steel, 40 Mercer evokes the Atelier's "architecture of light," with expansive proportions that speak to SoHo's classic cast-iron forbears, a lobby worthy of a museum, and a level of service that redefines urban luxury living. Surrounded by a wealth of fine boutiques - Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Prada - and celebrated restaurants - Cipriani Downtown is just steps away. Infused with the glamour and cosmopolitan ease that is, simply, SoHo, 40 Mercer integrates cutting-edge design with a rich array of amenities designed by renowned hotelier Andre Balazs, including membership in the exclusive M40 Club and 24-hour hotel-style concierge service. This remarkable high-floor corner loft with private entry, 11-foot-high ceilings, vast glass curtain walls, and panoramic city views presents a truly unique opportunity-that of living in a 21st-century architectural landmark at the epicenter of a cultural and fashion mecca.

listings.title: 135 Prince Street
listings.description_excerpt:
Prince Street is a bright, minimal two bedroom, two bathroom loft-style home in the heart of Soho. Restrained décor lets fine fixtures and excellent materials speak for themselves: wood, brick, and marble feature prominently, while enormous windows afford light in plenty. With its high-end shops and stylish boutiques, Soho is a tastemaker’s paradise, and here you’re steps from the destination shopping on quaint Prince Street and big-label Broadway. With the Prince Street N,R subway lines, Spring Street C,E lines, and Broadway-Lafayette B,D,F, and M lines, you’re perfectly connected throughout the city boroughs, too.

This property is available month-to-month.

listings.title: 145 Avenue  of the Americas
listings.description_excerpt: ### Designer Two Bedroom Two Home Offices SOHO Loft The large entrance foyer leads to this sensational and serene 2 Bed/2Bath/2 Home Offices, 3000 square foot loft created by and home to a world renowned fashion designer. Upon entering, one will be dazzled by the unique flooring which is completed in a one of a kind combination of pulverized mother of pearl and cement finished off in polyurethane. This lavish material, the personal creation of the owner, is also reflected on several walls throughout the residence creating a peaceful and warm atmosphere. The designer kitchen is finished in Boffi stainless steel. It features Corian counter tops, a chef's sink, Subzero stainless steel refrigerator, Miele dishwasher, Viking six burner stove with hood, and white lacquer Boffi cabinetry. Adding additional glamour is a custom Crystal Chandelier and custom ceiling light. The open living room has spectacular views of Sixth Avenue's SoHo Square with the neighborhood's pre-war buildings as the backdrop. There are 12 foot beamed ceilings throughout the residence. Walls of 8 foot windows, twenty in total, flood the home with light. There are 15 custom floor-to-ceiling closets. The residence has custom oak pocket doors and imported Rimadesio doors throughout. The master bedroom is a magical oasis with a white floating Boffi tub made of Corian, separate exceptional Boffi shower, and two designer finished walk-in closets. The master bedroom leads to a large home office and nanny's quarters with walls of custom oak closets and upper cabinetry. Abundant storage throughout as well as a privat...

listings.title: 45 Crosby Street
listings.description_excerpt:
Set in New York City’s desirable Soho, this immaculate two bedroom, one bathroom features chic Scandinavian furnishings and eclectic art. Unique features include an electronic drum set, guitar and two office areas. The home is three blocks from a subway stop and is surrounded by cozy cafes, posh boutiques, historic pubs and live jazz joints.

This home is available month-to-month.

listings.title: 55 Thompson Street
listings.description_excerpt:
Just when you thought
Soho had it all,
It does!
At the intersection of everything you ever dreamt of and above and beyond anything you’ve ever expected to find in a rental, 55 Thompson is a true gem. Your home base for exploring Soho’s boutiques, bistros and bars. Leisurely survey the New York skyline and the action below through room-sized windows, take your Sunday brunch on your private terrace or cozy up in front of your fireplace. And when the mood strikes you, all of Soho’s museums, galleries, and cinematic charm are just an elevator ride away.

listings.title: 43 Wooster Street
listings.description_excerpt:
Live and love this 2 bedroom, 2 bath, Loft in this boutique luxury building. Located on a cobblestone quiet section of Wooster, btw Grand and Broome, this building has only 10 apartments.

Ready at the end of November, this apartment is currently being gutted and refitted with the top of the line renovations. No detail will be overlooked. A full description of the finishes and photos are coming soon. ALL PHOTOS ARE RENDERINGS. This apartment must be seen to believe how beautiful it really is.

2 apartments per floor. Your keyed elevator takes you to your apartment. This apartment is very quiet and tranquil.

Doorman, W/D in Unit, High Ceilings, Keyed Elevator entrance, Storage Available

listings.title: 43 Wooster Street
listings.description_excerpt: Live and love this 2 bedroom, 2 bath, Loft in this boutique luxury building. Located on a cobblestone quiet section of Wooster, btw Grand and Broome, this building has only 10 apartments. Ready at the by Feb/March of 2014, this apartment is currently being gutted and refitted with the top of the line renovations. No detail will be overlooked. A full description of the finishes and photos are coming soon. ALL PHOTOS ARE RENDERINGS. This apartment must be seen to believe how beautiful it really is. 2 apartments per floor. Your keyed elevator takes you to your apartment. This apartment is very quiet and tranquil. Doorman, W/D in Unit, High Ceilings, Keyed Elevator entrance, Storage Available

listings.title: 45 Greene Street
listings.description_excerpt:
Stunning designer loft in heart of Soho!
! Prepare to be wowed by this exquisitely renovated 2700sf full floor condominium, now available for rent for the first time. A private elevator transports you to this bright and airy 2 bed/2 bath featuring a separate laundry room, 13'ceilings and humongous windows over looking Greene St. This entire apartment includes Lutron lighting, surround sound, central AC, mahogany floors and many custom mahogany built-ins for substantial storage. The enormous designer kitchen boasts Gaggenau, Subzero, ample marble counter tops and white lacquer cabinetry. Pocket doors allow for open entertaining or privacy and provide access to the entry foyer and dining area. To the back of the unit, a most unique master bedroom suite awaits you. Unlike most loft bedrooms, this one is enclosed in floor-ceiling glass windows on both the north and south sides, providing sunshine all day long. There are generous closets and an en-suite bath featuring a soaking tub and separate shower. The second bedroom faces west and offers gorgeous exposed brick and frosted glass walls. 45 Greene is a beautiful boutique condominium with video intercom system.

Also available furnished for $21,000 per month.

Six month term possible.

listings.title: 151 Wooster Street
listings.description_excerpt: This stunning 3bed/3bath condo rental is in a landmark doorman loft building in SoHo. The recently converted loft has top of the line finishes combined with 11 foot barrel vaulted ceilings and a gas fireplace. Entertain in your massive living space with an open chefs kitchen featuring Miele & Liebherr appliances and custom Italian cabinetry. The home features a large master suite with a walk in closet and spa style bathroom. There is a separate laundry room and the home has an abundance of storage space. 151 Wooster Street is the perfect SoHo location just south of Houston, close to the hottest restaurants and designer shops.

listings.title: 40 Mercer Street
listings.description_excerpt: SoHo’s discrete crown jewel This exquisite two bedroom, two bath condominium in Jean Nouvel’s 40 Mercer combines luxury living with lofty allure. The main living area, perched above quiet cobble-stoned Mercer Street, has dramatic 11 foot ceiling height, extensive wall space for art and incredible light through massive triple-paned windows with western and northern exposures. Quarter sawn White Oak and Walnut flooring throughout is accentuated by custom-made solid wood 9’ doors.The kitchen, designed Nouvel and built by Molteni, features a warm mixture of Wenge, Italian Walnut and Tanganika cabinetry with heavy gauge stainless steel counters/backsplash, and is equipped with Gaggenau, Miele and Subzero appliances. The two bedrooms’ flooring is in a rich Walnut. The Master Bedroom boasts a walk-in-closet, and the Master Bathroom features a double sink vanity, illuminated medicine cabinets, Lefroy Brooks fixtures, a deep 6’ soaking tub, a glass shower and radiant heated Calacutta Marble floors.Envisioned by hotel visionary Andre Balazs and designed by Pritzker Prize winning architect Jean Nouvel, 40 Mercer is a work of art in and of itself. Located in a quiet part of SoHo amongst the quintessential cast iron architecture, this full service white glove building with a discrete Mercer Street entrance also features rare underground parking providing direct access to the secure residential elevators. Additional building amenities include a residents’ landscaped terrace, a world-class fitness center designed for private personal training and a jaw-...

listings.title: 473 Broome Street
listings.description_excerpt:
This grand, beautiful and sun flooded 2400SF loft has been tastefully renovated with a modern aesthetic while keeping all of it's original details intact. Keyed-elevator opens to a magnificent HUGE Living/Dining space with 12.5' ornate tin-pressed ceilings, classic Corinthian cast-iron columns and great light from a wall of 7' high by 5' wide enormous windows that stretch the entire width of the loft (5 windows in all with open northern views). The renovated chef's kitchen, closed from the living space, can open up to the entertaining space and features marble counter tops, custom cabinetry, and top-of-the-line appliances including a Subzero refrigerator, Bosch dishwasher and professional Five Star range. Master Bedroom is very quiet with large southern facing windows and electronic shades. Master bath features an over sized shower with large rain shower head. When you step into this shower, you will be amazed at the 15' ceiling height inside with a beautiful skylight. The bathroom also features a large, free standing claw foot deep soaking tub and a ton of storage and closet space. The large second bedroom also has a huge skylight, a large home office/walk-in closet and plenty of storage. The entire loft is centrally air-conditioned, has a private laundry(full-sized side-by-side w/d) and custom lighting on dimmers throughout. The common roof deck is easily accessible from the loft with just one flight of stairs outside the door making it seem like your own private oasis.
This loft building was built in 1872, the Gunther Building is one of Soho's most desired landmark resi...

listings.title: 145 Sixth Avenue
listings.description_excerpt: This expansive 3.5 Bedroom, 2.5 bath loft with private terrace is located in between Dominick and Spring. Facing South and East, you will not long for light. Part time doorman, Washer / Dryer, Double Oven.

listings.title: 95 Greene Street
listings.description_excerpt:
GREAT SOHO LOFT! SUPERB LOCATION!
Grand, classy, serene, sunblasted! Experience Soho Living at its best. Located in the heart of Soho, best block on Greene, in one of the Premier prewar castiron loft building. This loft features 11' ceilings, oversized windows facing east and west. Great spacious and open living dinning area with wood floors, Two spacious bedrooms with large interior Den/office space. Amazing chef's kitchen with top of the line appliances, granite countertops, recently renovated, fabulous for entertaining. Two large bathrooms and two powder rooms. Washer and Dryer in the unit. Closets gallore. Available immediately fully furnished or unfurnished. This loft is truly one of a kind, SEE FOR YOURSELF!

listings.title: 311 West Broadway
listings.description_excerpt: New to the market! This sprawling 2,195 square foot 3 bedroom with 3.5 bathrooms boasts floor-to-ceiling windows with direct views of the landscaped courtyard, double exposures (East/West) a dramatic gallery entrance--ideal for displaying artwork, and a washer/dryer. The kitchen is fully equipped with Valcucine cabinetry of striated elm and smoked glass, and Sub-Zero, Miele and Gaggenau appliances. The master bedroom suite features a five-fixture master bath with statuary marble floors and radiant heat beneath, Kohler's Tea-for-Two 6' cast-iron tub, a frameless glass-enclosed shower, Lefroy Brooks fixtures and a Valcucine vanity. The floor plan lends itself to ultimate privacy, as the bedrooms are located on different ends of the apartment. Currently, this is the only available three-bedroom rental in the coveted and luxurious Soho Mews, designed by the renowned architectural firm, Gwathmey Siegel. Building amenities include a 24-hour doorman and porter service, an attended parking garage, a state of the art fitness center managed by Drive 495, a 4,000 square foot courtyard garden designed by Peter Walker Landscape Architecture, and access to a private gallery with rotating installations curated by the Art Production Fund. Pets are welcome. Shown exclusively by appointment only.

listings.title: 22 Mercer Street
listings.description_excerpt:
Prewar loft conversion retains the proportions & style of old SoHo while bringing in just the right amount of modern-day sophistication. The building is surprisingly incognito from the outside in spite of having the distinction of being one of the few doorman buildings in the Cast Iron District. Inside, it's intimate too, w/ only 4 units on each of the 5 floors of the building. The unit faces West & overlooks the quietest stretch of Mercer St. The majority of its 2,134+/- sq.ft. are dedicated to the living, dining & kitchen areas which co-exist under the same 12'+/- ceiling - yet they remain perfectly distinct from the other with the help of well-placed chandeliers, a wood-burning fireplace, breakfast & wet bars. The private areas are perfectly proportioned too, w/ a more intimate ceiling height throughout, en-suite baths in each of the bedrooms, powder room, utility closet & laudry room. This home has just been updated & is available for long-term lease. Sorry, no pets.

Click here to view this property's detail page on www.sothebyshomes.com

listings.title: 255 Hudson Street
listings.description_excerpt:
Lofty & Luxury Soho Condo
This absolutely gorgeous Loft-like apt has 2 bed, home office, and 2.5 bath featuring 11'ceiling, floor-to-ceiling windows, motorized sun protection with open views and sunlight. Open chef's kitchen equipped subzero refrigerator, Viking appliances, Bosch dishwasher, In-sink disposal, wine cooler, and Lava Stone countertop. Master bedroom has en-suite bathroom with double vanity, deep soaking tub, and separated shower stall. There is home office/entertaining room that can be converted to a 3rd bedroom. This apt has powder room, and big laundry closet with washer & dryer. Enjoy the central sound with in-room keypads & volume controls with iPod & XM docking. 255 Hudson offers Roof Terrace with panoramic city and river views, 24 hour doorman, live in super, and package room. Location is fantastic as short walk south to Tribeca, east to main Soho/Noho, north to West Village, and west steps to Hudson River Park.
